attributes.title: Delete
attributes.review: This app is horrible. Your phone does not deserve to be subjected to Donald Trump’s horribleness. Don’t do this to it. Please.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I was reading through the reviews just to find out I was not the only one who’s phone got hacked bc of this I decided to download bc I wanted to see what this Cheeto everyone calls a president was up to and when I wanted to go to my other apps everything was gone my apps my information my photos everything do not download unless you want to get hacked very dissapointed😔

attributes.title: i can’t believe this is on here

attributes.title: Worst app ive ever downloaded
attributes.review:
This app has the worst formatting ive ever seen. The interface is as pretty as bile. I can imagine anyone attempting to use this app would immediately give up. Not to mention the constant crashing. Not my favorite. 
I tried hard enough to make this look like a real review and now i give in
